[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@ugdu/runtime](./runtime.md) &gt; [UgduRuntime](./runtime.ugduruntime.md)

## UgduRuntime interface

Used to register and start `app`<!-- -->, load and unload resources, etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UgduRuntime 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [base](./runtime.ugduruntime.base.md) | string | Used to prepend to [UgduRuntimeModule.js](./runtime.ugduruntimemodule.js.md) and [UgduRuntimeModule.css](./runtime.ugduruntimemodule.css.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [modules](./runtime.ugduruntime.modules.md) | [UgduRuntimeModule](./runtime.ugduruntimemodule.md)<!-- -->\[\] | All <code>module</code>s which would be used. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [load(mn)](./runtime.ugduruntime.load.md) | Loads the <code>module</code> corresponding to <code>mn</code>. |
|  [register(name, predicate, load)](./runtime.ugduruntime.register.md) | Registers an <code>app</code>. |
|  [start()](./runtime.ugduruntime.start.md) | Starts this project. All <code>app</code>s(usually only one) which should be active will be mounted to the <code>document</code>. |
|  [unload(mn)](./runtime.ugduruntime.unload.md) | Unloads the <code>module</code> corresponding to <code>mn</code>. |
